verses.verse: <S%H6030>Answer<s%> me when I <S%H7121>call,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%> Give me <S%H7337>relief<s%> from my <S%H6862>distress.<s%> Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> on <S%H8085>me,<s%> and hear my <S%H8605>prayer.<s%>

You <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H376>men,<s%> how <S%H5704>long<s%> shall my <S%H3519>glory<s%> be turned into <S%H3639>dishonor?<s%> Will you <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H7385>vanity,<s%> and <S%H1245>seek<s%> after <S%H3577>falsehood?<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
But <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has set <S%H6395>apart<s%> for himself him who is <S%H2623>godly:<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%> when I call to <S%H7121>him.<s%>
Stand in <S%H7264>awe,<s%> and <S%H2398>don't<s%> sin. <S%H559>Search<s%> your own <S%H3824>heart<s%> on your <S%H4904>bed,<s%> and be <S%H1826>still.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> "Who will <S%H7200>show<s%> us any <S%H2896>good?<s%>" <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> let the <S%H216>light<s%> of your <S%H6440>face<s%> shine on <S%H216>us.<s%>
You have <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H8057>gladness<s%> in my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> more than <S%H6256>when<s%> their <S%H1715>grain<s%> and their new <S%H8492>wine<s%> are <S%H7231>increased.<s%>
In <S%H7965>peace<s%> I will <S%H3162>both<s%> lay myself <S%H7901>down<s%> and <S%H3462>sleep,<s%> for <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh <S%H910>alone,<s%> make me <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H983>safety.<s%>
